channel.title: Need help, how to change npc/item name
channel.description: I need to know how to change the name of the Npc/Item that i want.

item.title: Need help, how to change npc/item name
item.dc:creator: @csrsniper254 csrsniper254
item.description:
@csrsniper254 wrote:

It looks like we have came to a conclusion. Focus on other things right now.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help, how to change npc/item name
item.dc:creator: @sonjichan sonjichan
item.description:
@sonjichan wrote:

^^ yup. So… unless you plan on developing a client, then coding a server to work around with the new changes that you made to the cache, just stick to fixing problems that really matter, like… fixing skills, quests, mini-games, and such.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help, how to change npc/item name

item.title: Need help, how to change npc/item name
item.dc:creator: @csrsniper254 csrsniper254
item.description:
@csrsniper254 wrote:

That is the method for changing it clientside (similar to texture editing). However, to make this serverside you would have to edit the cache. Unbelievably hard and causes lag if you don’t set it up right.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help, how to change npc/item name

item.title: Need help, how to change npc/item name
item.dc:creator: @sonjichan sonjichan
item.description:
@sonjichan wrote:

Well with Items it has, you can change the name but only for your client. You’d have to redistribute a client made for your server after you’ve done this, otherwise there could be naming conflicts between the server’s itemhandler, and your client, and the server generally wins.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help, how to change npc/item name

item.title: Need help, how to change npc/item name
item.dc:creator: @csrsniper254 csrsniper254
item.description:
@csrsniper254 wrote:

It is impossible to do without editing the cache to make it serverside. This has not yet been accompolished to the extent of my knowledge.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help, how to change npc/item name
